@GutoLlewelyn @ghstorer @LJD1977 @skin_jones Often a rash reaction but I'd take a rash reaction over the current 'no reaction at all'.
@LJD1977 @ghstorer @skin_jones Indeed mate. They all had their critics but each of them head & shoulders over current lot, bar Gylfi.
@ghstorer @LJD1977 @skin_jones What I wouldn't give for the likes of Chico Flores, JDG or a fit Michu in the side right now - winners.
@skin_jones @LJD1977 It's like what we had, who we were, what we'd achieved, how has it all come to this, and so quickly?!
@skin_jones @LJD1977 Things are looking grim chaps.
We are so poor all over the pitch, almost every position. Can't see us throwing money at it and who would come here anyway right now?
@LJD1977 Only a win from safety somehow so think there's still a glimmer of hope. Some quick decisions need to be made or we're doomed mate.
Surely the owners will have no choice but to relieve Bradley of his duties if we head into January winless from West Ham/Bournemouth games??
